name: Bed & Breakfast Kolory

reviews.text: What the other reviews said - a great B&B located in a really buzzing area of Krakow. The 2-bedroom apartment we stayed in was clean, spacious and well-equipped. Families with small children - note that there is no lift but prams can be left downstairs at reception.
reviews.title: Great location, price and amenities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were friendly, knowledgeable and happy to assist with booking tours. Breakfast is OK - no hot food but plenty of breads, cheeses, cereals etc. Plenty to fill up on.
reviews.title: Excellent B & B in the heart of Krakow
location
reviews.text: We would certainly stay here again.
Situated near the Jewish district of Krakow this B & B is close to all attractions and amidst vibrant nightlife of the area. Includes free breakfast and wi-fi. Metered parking available on street.
reviews.title: Great B&B but hard to sleep

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good accommodation and amenities for price.
reviews.title: Great Little B&B

reviews.text: I stayed at Kolory BnB for 3 nights at the start of february.From arriving until leaving all the staff were friendly and approachable and gave good advice about sight seeing,restaurants and local bars.This BnB is located on PLAC Nowy,a square in the Jewish Quarter Kazimierz,that is famous for bars.Both Alchemia and Singer bars,2 of Krakow,s most famous bars are on your doorstep.Staying in this area gives a more local feel to Krakow,a more Polish experience,and is about 20 mins walk from the Old town Square,the main tourist area.I really enjoyed my stay,thought it was well worth the money and i would definately stay here again...
reviews.title: Location Location...

reviews.text: My third visit to beautiful Krakow but the first time I have stayed in Kazimierz and I loved it! B&B Kolory is really quirky and you feel like you are experiencing a little bit of the real city and not one designed just for visitors. The location is perfect for everything you want to see and do.
reviews.title: What a find!

reviews.text: My room overlooked the square and I am a light sleeper, but I wasn't disturbed at all by the early morning market or the night time revellers. The room was not plush but perfectly comfortable and spotlessly clean.
reviews.title: Cheap & Cheerful Kolory

reviews.text: I will definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Good Location-Experience The Real Krakow

reviews.text: Trisha
reviews.title: August in Krakow

reviews.text: We really enjoyed this B&B. The location couldn't be any better for eating out, enjoying the Krakow nightlife and touring the city. Our rooms was very clean, nicely decorated, great service, good breakfast and very helpful staff. Would definitely stay again.
reviews.title: Great place to stay in krakow

reviews.text: We chose this B&B as the price and reviews were good and as it still had vacancies. Who would have thought that May would be so busy? Its location meant that you can walk to any of the sights you want to see in Krakow. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Though ours overlooked the market square and bars, so a tad noisey. I had made a mistake with our booking and the staff were extremely helpful. Lots to eat at breakfast and the staff were very friendly and helpful all the time. I would certainly reccommend this hotel. The rooms are decorated with wood carvings and naive paintings depicting country life. I see from one of the reviews that there was no shampoo, but I was not expecting any, or hairdryer. It is a bed and breakfast and not a large hotel. The atmosphere there is very relaxed and its easy to chat to other guests over breakfast. Lots of restaurants to choose from. 'Kuchnia u Doroty' is a typical polish restaurant (unlicensed) which is used by locals (though the menu is also in english) and three of us ate for a total of £10! We ate very well in Krakow. Lots to see and do.
reviews.title: Charming Bed and Breakfast

reviews.text: Nice place to stay in Cracow! The Jewish area is very nice, with good pubs and restaurants close to the B&B.
reviews.title: Very good location!!

reviews.text: Very close from the castle and the old town, about 10 min walking.
reviews.title: Great B&B, Fantastic Location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The decoration of the B&B is quite simple, but it is a very nice place. Good polish breakfast.
reviews.title: Budget bargain break!

reviews.text: Nice and simple BB hotel. Rooms are comfortable, clean. Staff is very helpful. Hotel is surrounded by plenty of bars, restaurant. We have tried many of them - Singer coffee shop next door, Moment bar & lounge (very good food & variety of drinks). You won't have time to stay in the hotel at all. Krakow is great city to explore. Do not forget to book a trip to Weliczka. Guys at the reception can do it for you.
reviews.title: Right in the middle of the Kazimierz jewish town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When you are coming back to the hotel quite late (well, in early morning), there are "zapiekanky" (polish backed panini) fast food shops right in front of the hotel.
reviews.title: Try a Sunday flea market on your doorstep!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would recommend this hotel to my friends. Great value for money.
reviews.title: NICE AND WARM

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One disadvantage - parking - during weekend it is for free on the street, during weekdays, you have to pay via parking machine (max. 3 or 4 hours payment) :(
reviews.title: Would recommend to a friend.

reviews.text: Nice and cosy B&B, their offer is like Michael O'Leary's, without hidden charges though- damn simple sleep and eat place.
reviews.title: This a gem

description: When booking a room at Bed & Breakfast Kolory, you are selecting a place offering numerous options of entertainment and relaxation. Bed & Breakfast Kolory is located at Plac Nowy, Krakow inhabitant's favourite pastime place. When at Bed & Breakfast Kolory, you have all of Krakow within hand's reach.
